note.p: Farmer. Of Keston Court Farm near Down. Retired to Down by 1871. Regular contributor to Down Coal & Clothing Club.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/462/101/4), 1871 (RG10/875/35/3)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 28 September 2018)
